sourceText: Climate change is affecting weather patterns around the world. Scientists have observed rising temperatures, melting ice caps, and more frequent extreme weather events. Many countries are now implementing renewable energy policies to reduce carbon emissions. Solar and wind power are becoming more affordable and efficient. The transition to clean energy requires significant investment but offers long-term environmental and economic benefits. Governments, businesses, and individuals all have roles to play in addressing this global challenge. Education and awareness are crucial for encouraging sustainable practices and lifestyle changes.
